chapter.text: Pali kumwamba ndi pali Nyenyezi yowala
Kodi chidzakudziwitsa kuti Nyenyezi yowala ndi chiani
Ndithudi moyo uliwonse uli ndi mtetezi wake
Tamulekani munthu kuti aganize kuti adalengedwa kuchokera ku chiyani
Iye adalengedwa kuchokera ku madzi otuluka
Amene amatuluka kuchokera pakati pa pfupa la munsana ndi nthiti
Ndithudi Iye ali ndi mphamvu zomudzutsa
Pa tsiku limene zinthu zobisika zidzayesedwa
Ndipo adzakhala wopanda mphamvu kapena womuthandiza
Pali mtambo umene umapereka mvula kawiri kawiri
Ndi pali dziko lapansi limene limang’ambika
Ndithudi! Awa ndi mawu amene amasiyanitsa
Ndithudi iwo Al-A’la	649 ali kukonza chiwembu
Motero apatse nthawi anthu osakhulupirira. Ndipo chita nawo mwamtendere pa kanthawi kochepa
